description: List job production plan display unit of measures
permissions: Allowed when the user can access the related job production plans via JobProductionPlanDisplayUnitOfMeasurePolicy, which delegates authorization to the associated job production plan.

flags.name: --job-production-plan
flags.description: Filter by job production plan ID. Example: --job-production-plan 123.

flags.name: --unit-of-measure
flags.description: Filter by unit of measure ID. Example: --unit-of-measure 456.
